name: read evs field
desc: Read a dataset from any of six different EVS compatible file formats into an EVS field.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Low Quality Filename
properties.desc: The field file to read when in low output quality mode.

properties.name: File Creation Date
properties.desc: Display the File Creation Date if it is set in the file.

properties.name: File Notes
properties.desc: Display the File Notes if it they are set in the file.

properties.name: Vertical Offset
properties.desc: Vertical Offset translates your entire model in Z by the value input multiplied by the Z Exaggeration.  This is useful if you want to move your model to avoid having coincident objects.

properties.name: Explode By
properties.desc: The Explode By options determine what information is used to explode the layers or materials. Layer and Material are nodal data components that should be present with any hierarchical geologic model. The Cell Set option allows you to explode by the Cell Set number. The Lithology option is to be used only with Adaptive Indicator Kriged geologic models.  These models have a cell data component called Lithology which corresponds to integer values assigned to material regions.

properties.name: Explode Begins
properties.desc: Explode Begins determines the first layer or material that will be exploded.

properties.name: Explode Ends
properties.desc: Explode Ends sets the last layer/material which will be exploded.  This value defaults to -1 which will explode all remaining layers or materials.

properties.name: Cell Sets
properties.desc: The Cell Sets control allows selected cell sets to be turned off in the output.

properties.name: Color By
properties.desc: The Color By control allows the user to set how the color of the output should be determined.

properties.name: Nodal Data Component
properties.desc: If Color By is set to Node Data the Nodal Data Component selects which nodal data will set the data map.

properties.name: Cell Data Component
properties.desc: If Color By is set to Cell Data the Cell Data Component selects which cell data will set the data map.

properties.name: Copy Flagged Data
properties.desc: The Copy Flagged Data toggle allows the user to keep special flagged data (radius, color, etc.) along with the selected data

properties.name: Max Edge Angle
properties.desc: The Max Edge Angle angle is defined as the angle between two faces or cells in the model.
